title: Side By Side
description: A little mouse finds a best friend to stay by her side!Deep in the heart of Wintermouse Wood, down in the grass where the autumn trees stood, lived all kinds of creatures -- some big and some small -- Some spiky, some furry, some short, and some tall. Follow one little mouseling and her search for a best friend to stay by her side in this joyful read-aloud bedtime book -- the perfect celebration of friendship. Rachel Bright's sweet text and Debi Gliori's heartwarming illustrations show the importance of friendship.
author: Rachel Bright
